SCTX:
Begin lightofdayScript

float damage
short OnPCEquip
short doOnce

if ( menumode == 1)
	return
endif

if ( OnPCEquip == 1 )
	if ( PCVampire == 1 )
		set damage to -7
		set damage to ( damage * GetSecondsPassed )
		Player->ModCurrentHealth, Damage
			if ( doOnce == 0 )
				MessageBox "Your had begins to blister and burn with the pain of a thousand suns. A voice echoes in your mind, 'Never shall you wield this, evil thing.'"	
				set doOnce to -1
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( OnPCEquip != 1 )
	set doOnce to 0
endif

End lightofdayScript
